metadata.title: Week 1 Day 3: Introduction to Latin Nouns

prior_knowledge_digest: Students should have a basic understanding of the Latin alphabet and pronunciation rules. They should also be familiar with the concept of nouns in English, including their role as subjects and objects in sentences. Prior exposure to the idea of grammatical gender and number in languages like Spanish or French will be beneficial, as Latin also uses these concepts. Students should recall the vocabulary introduced in the first two days, such as 'amicus' (friend) and 'familia' (family).
yesterday_recap: Yesterday, we explored the Latin alphabet and practiced pronunciation. We also learned some basic vocabulary words and their meanings.
misconception_watchlist: Confusing noun endings with verb endings

primary: Understand the concept of grammatical gender in Latin
Identify and use basic Latin nouns

lesson_flow.description: Review the Latin alphabet and pronunciation rules.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students recite the alphabet and practice pronunciation.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Focus on correct pronunciation and address any lingering issues.

lesson_flow.description: Quick recap of vocabulary from previous lessons.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students match words with meanings using flashcards.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Encourage students to recall meanings without hints.

lesson_flow.description: Introduce the concept of grammatical gender in Latin nouns.
lesson_flow.student_action: Listen and take notes on the explanation of gender.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Use examples from familiar languages to illustrate gender.

lesson_flow.description: Practice identifying the gender of Latin nouns using examples.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students work in pairs to classify nouns by gender.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Provide immediate feedback and correct misconceptions.

lesson_flow.description: Students complete a worksheet on noun gender and vocabulary.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Circulate to assist and ensure understanding.

lesson_flow.description: Summarize the day's learning and preview the next lesson.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students share one new thing they learned.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Highlight the importance of patience in learning a new language.
